name: Vessels Report
query:
select 
	tba.vessel_type as "Vessel Type",
	COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '1' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Jan,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '2' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Feb,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '3' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Mar,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '4' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Apr,
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '5' THEN tba.vessel
    END) May,
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '6' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Jun,
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '7' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Jul,
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '8' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Aug,
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '9' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Sep,
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '10' THEN tba.vessel
    END) Oct
	
from
	`tabBooking Request` tba
where
	tba.docstatus = 1
	and tba.vessel_type is not null
group by
	(tba.vessel_type)
